name: BlueSky Learning
description:
We believe in the power of experiential learning in helping people bridge the gap from knowing ( What is) to reflection (Where am I?) and eventually to doing (What do I do?).

Our PhilosophyWhile we understand that behavioural changes can be hard, we employ all the techniques experts talk of to create change in human behaviour. It is well beyond practising something for 21 days to make it a habit!
business_objectives: Accelerate Skill Development and Learning Efficiency
Headline: BlueSky is about doers. And moving our learners from KNOWING to DOING.

enhanced_description: BlueSky Learning specializes in experiential game-based learning to bridge the gap from knowing to doing, making learning engaging, immersive, impactful, and fun. Their philosophy emphasizes facilitating deep behavioral change for long-term impact, extending beyond simple knowledge acquisition and quick fixes. With 18 years of experience, BlueSky Learning is a leader in the field, leveraging a team of continuously learning facilitators to create fresh and interesting learning experiences tailored for behavioral competency, leadership, and team development. The core business objective is to accelerate skill development and learning efficiency.
